descriptionHtml:
Nephae, a little Breton female. Expert assasin and good thief. Good companion for Dragonborn and avaible spouse ;). She has got a little gift in her inventory ;). Enjoy!
You can find her in Morthal at Moorside Inn.

*How to install:
 - Manually: drop files rar in main skyrim folder data and overwrite them.
 - NMM: open program and add nephae rar and active it.
*Attention!
Make sure the esp file is actived in skyrim launcher data files.
*How to uninstall:
Delete nephae files in main skyrim data folder, textures and meshes.

Useful mod:
I use this mods in my skyrim game .... take a look ;)
Texture : Better Females by Bella by BellaGail http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812
Thief Armor: Another Black Thieves Guild Armor by Shaft28 http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7163
author: Nephae

files.name: Nephae -  the Breton Assasin Thief Follower
